import Axios from 'axios'; import React, { useState } from 'react'; import VaccineList from '../Components/VaccinesSelectDropDown' import { useInput } from '../Data/useInput'; const Acknowledge = () => { const config = { method: 'get', url: 'http://localhost:8765/api/vaccines/', headers: { 'auth': localStorage.getItem('vmisJwt') } }; const { value: quantity, bind: bindQuantity, reset: resetQuantity } = useInput(''); // const { value: quantity, bind: bindQuantity, reset: resetQuantity } = useInput(''); const [selectedVaccine, setSelectedVaccine] = useState('') const [damaged, setDamaged] = useState(null) const handleWatsageSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() } console.log(quantity) const handleChange = (e) => { if (e.target.value === "yes") { resetQuantity() setSelectedVaccine('') setDamaged(true) } else if (e.target.value === "no") { resetQuantity() setSelectedVaccine('') setDamaged(false) } } const handleAcknowledgmentApiRequest = () => { Axios.post(config).then(res => { }).catch(error => { }) } return (
